verses.verse: And it came to pass in the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> year <WH8141>, in the twelfth month <WH2320>, in the first <WH259> day of the month <WH2320>, that the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, take up <WH5375> <WH8798> a lamentation <WH7015> for Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto him, Thou art like <WH1819> <WH8738> a young lion <WH3715> of the nations <WH1471>, and thou art as a whale <WH8577> <WH8676> <WH8565> in the seas <WH3220>: and thou camest forth <WH1518> <WH8799> with thy rivers <WH5104>, and troubledst <WH1804> <WH8799> the waters <WH4325> with thy feet <WH7272>, and fouledst <WH7515> <WH8799> their rivers <WH5104>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; I will therefore spread out <WH6566> <WH8804> my net <WH7568> over thee with a company <WH6951> of many <WH7227> people <WH5971>; and they shall bring thee up <WH5927> <WH8689> in my net <WH2764>.

Then will I leave <WH5203> <WH8804> thee upon the land <WH776>, I will cast thee forth <WH2904> <WH8686> upon the open <WH6440> field <WH7704>, and will cause all the fowls <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064> to remain <WH7931> <WH8689> upon thee, and I will fill <WH7646> <WH8689> the beasts <WH2416> of the whole earth <WH776> with thee.
And I will lay <WH5414> <WH8804> thy flesh <WH1320> upon the mountains <WH2022>, and fill <WH4390> <WH8765> the valleys <WH1516> with thy height <WH7419>.

I will also water <WH8248> <WH8689> with thy blood <WH1818> the land <WH776> wherein thou swimmest <WH6824>, even to the mountains <WH2022>; and the rivers <WH650> shall be full <WH4390> <WH8735> of thee.

And when I shall put thee out <WH3518> <WH8763>, I will cover <WH3680> <WH8765> the heaven <WH8064>, and make <WH6937> the stars <WH3556> thereof dark <WH6937> <WH8689>; I will cover <WH3680> <WH8762> the sun <WH8121> with a cloud <WH6051>, and the moon <WH3394> shall not give <WH215> <WH8686> her light <WH216>.

All the bright <WH3974> lights <WH216> of heaven <WH8064> will I make dark <WH6937> <WH8686> over thee, and set <WH5414> <WH8804> darkness <WH2822> upon thy land <WH776>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

I will also vex <WH3707> <WH8689> the hearts <WH3820> of many <WH7227> people <WH5971>, when I shall bring <WH935> <WH8687> thy destruction <WH7667> among the nations <WH1471>, into the countries <WH776> which thou hast not known <WH3045> <WH8804>.

Yea, I will make many <WH7227> people <WH5971> amazed <WH8074> <WH8689> at thee, and their kings <WH4428> shall be horribly <WH8178> afraid <WH8175> <WH8799> for thee, when I shall brandish <WH5774> <WH8788> my sword <WH2719> before them <WH6440>; and they shall tremble <WH2729> <WH8804> at every moment <WH7281>, every man <WH376> for his own life <WH5315>, in the day <WH3117> of thy fall <WH4658>.
For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; The sword <WH2719> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> shall come <WH935> <WH8799> upon thee.

By the swords <WH2719> of the mighty <WH1368> will I cause thy multitude <WH1995> to fall <WH5307> <WH8686>, the terrible <WH6184> of the nations <WH1471>, all of them: and they shall spoil <WH7703> <WH8804> the pomp <WH1347> of Egypt <WH4714>, and all the multitude <WH1995> thereof shall be destroyed <WH8045> <WH8738>.

I will destroy <WH6> <WH8689> also all the beasts <WH929> thereof from <WH5921> beside the great <WH7227> waters <WH4325>; neither shall the foot <WH7272> of man <WH120> trouble <WH1804> <WH8799> them any more, nor the hoofs <WH6541> of beasts <WH929> trouble <WH1804> <WH8799> them.
Then will I make their waters <WH4325> deep <WH8257> <WH8686>, and cause their rivers <WH5104> to run <WH3212> <WH8686> like oil <WH8081>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

When I shall make <WH5414> <WH8800> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> desolate <WH8077>, and the country <WH776> shall be destitute <WH8074> <WH8737> of that whereof it was full <WH4393>, when I shall smite <WH5221> <WH8687> all them that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> therein, then shall they know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.

This is the lamentation <WH7015> wherewith they shall lament <WH6969> <WH8790> her: the daughters <WH1323> of the nations <WH1471> shall lament <WH6969> <WH8787> her: they shall lament <WH6969> <WH8787> for her, even for Egypt <WH4714>, and for all her multitude <WH1995>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

It came to pass also in the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> year <WH8141>, in the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day of the month <WH2320>, that the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, wail <WH5091> <WH8798> for the multitude <WH1995> of Egypt <WH4714>, and cast them down <WH3381> <WH8685>, even her, and the daughters <WH1323> of the famous <WH117> nations <WH1471>, unto the nether parts <WH8482> of the earth <WH776>, with them that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> into the pit <WH953>.
Whom dost thou pass in beauty <WH5276> <WH8804>? go down <WH3381> <WH8798>, and be thou laid <WH7901> <WH8713> with the uncircumcised <WH6189>.

They shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> in the midst <WH8432> of them that are slain <WH2491> by the sword <WH2719>: she is delivered <WH5414> <WH8738> to the sword <WH2719>: draw <WH4900> <WH8798> her and all her multitudes <WH1995>.

The strong <WH410> among the mighty <WH1368> shall speak <WH1696> <WH8762> to him out of the midst <WH8432> of SH'ol <WH7585> with them that help <WH5826> <WH8802> him: they are gone down <WH3381> <WH8804>, they lie <WH7901> <WH8804> uncircumcised <WH6189>, slain <WH2491> by the sword <WH2719>.
Asshur <WH804> is there and all her company <WH6951>: his graves <WH6913> are about <WH5439> him: all of them slain <WH2491>, fallen <WH5307> <WH8802> by the sword <WH2719>:

Whose graves <WH6913> are set <WH5414> <WH8738> in the sides <WH3411> of the pit <WH953>, and her company <WH6951> is round about <WH5439> her grave <WH6900>: all of them slain <WH2491>, fallen <WH5307> <WH8802> by the sword <WH2719>, which caused <WH5414> <WH8804> terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>.

There is Elam <WH5867> and all her multitude <WH1995> round about <WH5439> her grave <WH6900>, all of them slain <WH2491>, fallen <WH5307> <WH8802> by the sword <WH2719>, which are gone down <WH3381> <WH8804> uncircumcised <WH6189> into the nether parts <WH8482> of the earth <WH776>, which caused <WH5414> <WH8804> their terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>; yet have they borne <WH5375> <WH8799> their shame <WH3639> with them that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> to the pit <WH953>.

They have set <WH5414> <WH8804> her a bed <WH4904> in the midst <WH8432> of the slain <WH2491> with all her multitude <WH1995>: her graves <WH6913> are round about <WH5439> him: all of them uncircumcised <WH6189>, slain <WH2491> by the sword <WH2719>: though their terror <WH2851> was caused <WH5414> <WH8737> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>, yet have they borne <WH5375> <WH8799> their shame <WH3639> with them that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> to the pit <WH953>: he is put <WH5414> <WH8738> in the midst <WH8432> of them that be slain <WH2491>.

There is Meshech <WH4902>, Tubal <WH8422>, and all her multitude <WH1995>: her graves <WH6913> are round about <WH5439> him: all of them uncircumcised <WH6189>, slain <WH2490> <WH8794> by the sword <WH2719>, though they caused <WH5414> <WH8804> their terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>.

And they shall not lie <WH7901> <WH8799> with the mighty <WH1368> that are fallen <WH5307> <WH8802> of the uncircumcised <WH6189>, which are gone down <WH3381> <WH8804> to SH'ol <WH7585> with their weapons <WH3627> of war <WH4421>: and they have laid <WH5414> <WH8799> their swords <WH2719> under their heads <WH7218>, but their iniquities <WH5771> shall be upon their bones <WH6106>, though they were the terror <WH2851> of the mighty <WH1368> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>.
Yea, thou shalt be broken <WH7665> <WH8735> in the midst <WH8432> of the uncircumcised <WH6189>, and shalt lie <WH7901> <WH8799> with them that are slain <WH2491> with the sword <WH2719>.

There is Edom <WH123>, her kings <WH4428>, and all her princes <WH5387>, which with their might <WH1369> are laid <WH5414> <WH8738> by them that were slain <WH2491> by the sword <WH2719>: they shall lie <WH7901> <WH8799> with the uncircumcised <WH6189>, and with them that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> to the pit <WH953>.

There be the princes <WH5257> of the north <WH6828>, all of them, and all the Zidonians <WH6722>, which are gone down <WH3381> <WH8804> with the slain <WH2491>; with their terror <WH2851> they are ashamed <WH954> <WH8802> of their might <WH1369>; and they lie <WH7901> <WH8799> uncircumcised <WH6189> with them that be slain <WH2491> by the sword <WH2719>, and bear <WH5375> <WH8799> their shame <WH3639> with them that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> to the pit <WH953>.

Pharaoh <WH6547> shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> them, and shall be comforted <WH5162> <WH8738> over all his multitude <WH1995>, even Pharaoh <WH6547> and all his army <WH2428> slain <WH2491> by the sword <WH2719>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

For I have caused <WH5414> <WH8804> my terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>: and he shall be laid <WH7901> <WH8717> in the midst <WH8432> of the uncircumcised <WH6189> with them that are slain <WH2491> with the sword <WH2719>, even Pharaoh <WH6547> and all his multitude <WH1995>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
